data_table.description: Informant Interview Form, IFI. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: IFIA01
variable.description: [History]. Before we get started could you please tell me what was your relationship to the deceased? Informant's relationship to deceased. Q1 [Informant Interview Form, IFI]

variable.name: IFIA02
variable.description: [History]. I'd like to ask you about ( )'s medical history. If you have any questions as we go along, please ask me. First, think back to about one month before ( ) died. At that time, was he/she sick or ill, with his/her activities limited, or was he/she normally active for the most part? Q2 [Informant Interview Form, IFI]

variable.name: IFIA03
variable.description: [History]. Was ( ) being cared for at a nursing home, or at another place at the time of death? Q3 [Informant Interview Form, IFI]

variable.name: IFIA05
variable.description: [History]. Hospitalized in past four week. Q5 [Informant Interview Form, IFI]

variable.name: IFIA06A
variable.description: [History]. Hospitalized for heart attack or chest pain. Q6a [Informant Interview Form, IFI]

variable.name: IFIA06B
variable.description: [History]. Hospitalized for heart surgery. Q6b [Informant Interview Form, IFI]

variable.name: IFIA06C
variable.description: [History]. Hospitalized for other reason. Q6c [Informant Interview Form, IFI]

variable.name: IFIA09
variable.description: [History]. Was ( ) seen by a physician anytime in the last four weeks prior to death? Q9 [Informant Interview Form, IFI]

variable.name: IFIA12
variable.description: [History]. Before ( ) 's final illness, had he/she ever had pains in the chest from heart disease, for example angina pectoris? Q12 [Informant Interview Form, IFI]

variable.name: IFIA13
variable.description: [History]. Did ( ) ever take nitroglycerin for this pain? Q13 [Informant Interview Form, IFI]

variable.name: IFIA14
variable.description: [History]. Did a doctor ever say that ( ) had a heart attack prior to his/her final illness? Q14 [Informant Interview Form, IFI]

variable.name: IFIA15
variable.description: [History]. Was ( ) hospitalized for a heart attack? Q15 [Informant Interview Form, IFI]

variable.name: IFIA16
variable.description: [History]. Did he/she ever have a coronary bypass operation, balloon angioplasty or some other operation or procedure to improve the circulation of blood to the heart? Q16 [Informant Interview Form, IFI]

variable.name: IFIA17
variable.description: [History]. Did ( ) ever have any other heart disease or heart condition before his/her final illness? Q17 [Informant Interview Form, IFI]

variable.name: IFIA18
variable.description: [History]. Did ( ) ever have a stroke? Q18 [Informant Interview Form, IFI]

variable.name: IFIA19A
variable.description: [History]. Did he/she have a stroke within four weeks of his/her final illness? Q19a [Informant Interview Form, IFI]

variable.name: IFIA19B
variable.description: [History]. Did he/she have a history of cigarette smoking? Q19b [Informant Interview Form, IFI]

variable.name: IFIA19C
variable.description: [History]. Did he/she have a history of diabetes? Q19c [Informant Interview Form, IFI]

variable.name: IFIA21
variable.description: [Circumstances surrounding death]. The next set of questions may go over some of what you have already told me. Although it may seem repetitious, I must ask these questions for consistency of information. Were you present when ( ) died? Q21

variable.name: IFIA22
variable.description: [Circumstances surrounding death]. Did anyone see or hear when he/she died? Q22[Informant Interview Form, IFI]

variable.name: IFIA23
variable.description: [Circumstances surrounding death]. Was anyone close enough to hear if he/she had called out? Q23 [Informant Interview Form, IFI]

variable.name: IFIA24
variable.description: [Circumstances surrounding death]. How long was last known to be alive was he/she found dead? Q24 [Informant Interview Form, IFI]

variable.name: IFIA25
variable.description: [Circumstances surrounding death]. Where was ( ) when he/she died? Q25 [Informant Interview Form, IFI]
variable.value: On a bus or public transportation

variable.name: IFIA26
variable.description: [Symptoms]. Did ( ) experience pain or discomfort in his/her chest, left arm, or shoulder or jaw either just before death or within 3 days (72 hours) of death? Q26 [Informant Interview Form, IFI]

variable.name: IFIA27
variable.description: [Symptoms]. The next set of questions deal specifically with the last episode of ( )'s pain or discomfort. The last episode is defined as starting at the time ( ) noticed discomfort that caused him/her to stop or change what he/she was doing. Did ( )'s last episode of pain or discomfort specifically involve the chest? Q27 [Informant Interview Form, IFI]

variable.name: IFIA28
variable.description: [Symptoms]. Did he/she take nitroglycerin because of this last episode of pain or discomfort? Q28 [Informant Interview Form, IFI]

variable.name: IFIA29
variable.description: [Symptoms]. How long was it from the beginning of ( )'s last episode of pain or discomfort to the time he/she stopped breathing on his/her own? Q29 [Informant Interview Form, IFI]

variable.name: IFIA30A
variable.description: [Symptoms]. Within 3 days of death or just before ( ) died, did any of the following symptoms begin for the first time? Shortness of breath. Q30a [Informant Interview Form, IFI]

variable.name: IFIA30B
variable.description: [Symptoms]. Within 3 days of death or just before ( ) died, did any of the following symptoms begin for the first time? Dizziness. Q30b [Informant Interview Form, IFI]

variable.name: IFIA30C
variable.description: [Symptoms]. Within 3 days of death or just before ( ) died, did any of the following symptoms begin for the first time? Palpitations (pounding in the chest). Q30c [Informant Interview Form, IFI]

variable.name: IFIA30D
variable.description: [Symptoms]. Within 3 days of death or just before ( ) died, did any of the following symptoms begin for the first time? Marked or increased fatigue, tiredness, or weakness. Q30d [Informant Interview Form, IFI]

variable.name: IFIA30E
variable.description: [Symptoms]. Within 3 days of death or just before ( ) died, did any of the following symptoms begin for the first time? Headache. Q30e [Informant Interview Form, IFI]

variable.name: IFIA30F
variable.description: [Symptoms]. Within 3 days of death or just before ( ) died, did any of the following symptoms begin for the first time? Sweating. Q30f [Informant Interview Form, IFI]

variable.name: IFIA30G
variable.description: [Symptoms]. Within 3 days of death or just before ( ) died, did any of the following symptoms begin for the first time? Paralysis. Q30g [Informant Interview Form, IFI]

variable.name: IFIA30H
variable.description: [Symptoms]. Within 3 days of death or just before ( ) died, did any of the following symptoms begin for the first time? Loss of speech. Q30h [Informant Interview Form, IFI]

variable.name: IFIA30I
variable.description: [Symptoms]. Within 3 days of death or just before ( ) died, did any of the following symptoms begin for the first time? Attack of indigestion or nausea or vomiting. Q30i [Informant Interview Form, IFI]

variable.name: IFIA30J
variable.description: [Symptoms]. Within 3 days of death or just before ( ) died, did any of the following symptoms begin for the first time? Other symptoms. Q30j [Informant Interview Form, IFI]

variable.name: IFIA31
variable.description: [Emergency medical care]. Was a physician, ambulance, or other emergency medical team called? Q31 [Informant Interview Form, IFI]

variable.name: IFIA32
variable.description: [Emergency medical care]. Was (the physician, ambulance, or EMS team) called because of symptoms ( ) was having or after he/she was already dead? Q32 [Informant Interview Form, IFI]

variable.name: IFIA33
variable.description: [Emergency medical care]. How long was it from the time the last episode of symptoms started to the time that medical assistance was called for? Q33 [Informant Interview Form, IFI]

variable.name: IFIA34
variable.description: [Emergency medical care]. How long was it from the time that medical care was called to the time when it arrived? Q34 [Informant Interview Form, IFI]

variable.name: IFIA35
variable.description: [Emergency medical care]. Were resuscitation measures, such as closed chest massage or CPR, attempted at the time? Q35 [Informant Interview Form, IFI]

variable.name: IFIA36
variable.description: [Emergency medical care]. Who started the resuscitation or CPR? Q36 [Informant Interview Form, IFI]
variable.value: Ambulance attendant, paramedic, or other health professional

variable.name: IFIA37
variable.description: [Emergency medical care]. Where was resuscitation or CPR started? Q37 [Informant Interview Form, IFI]

variable.name: IFIA38
variable.description: [Emergency medical care]. Was ( ) taken to a hospital? Q38 [Informant Interview Form, IFI]

variable.name: IFIA42
variable.description: [Emergency medical care]. How was he/she related to the deceased? Q42 [Informant Interview Form, IFI]

variable.name: IFIA43
variable.description: [Reliability]. Did the respondent frequently contradict himself/herself or give information that he/she would have no way of knowing? Q43 [Informant Interview Form, IFI]

variable.name: IFIA44
variable.description: [Reliability]. Did the respondent seem to be reluctant to answer questions and thus might not have given all the information the interviewer would wish to know? Q44 [Informant Interview Form, IFI]

variable.name: IFIA45
variable.description: [Reliability]. On the basis of these questions, give your rating of reliability of the interview. Q45 [Informant Interview Form, IFI]

variable.name: IFIA46
variable.description: [Reliability]. Would you like to add other details concerning the quality of the interview? Q46 [Informant Interview Form, IFI]

variable.name: IFIAFLAG
variable.description: =1 if IFIA (or later version) is present [Informant Interview Form, IFI]

variable.name: IFIA19
variable.description: [History]. Stroke in four weeks before death. Q19 [Informant Interview Form, IFI]

variable.name: FORMVER
variable.description: Form version

variable.name: IFIA07_DAYS
variable.description: [History]. What was the date of the hospital admission? Days. Q7 [Informant Interview Form, IFI]

variable.name: GWAS_ID
variable.description: ARIC occurrence ID [Informant Interview Form, IFI]
